comments: Mr. Kevin Powers was a sub once for Jay Miller\'s class. I learned more from Kevin then I ever did Jay. Fantastic teacher!!

tag_professor: Gives good feedback (1)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)
comments: Very organized and answers emails. Online class and also took the math class with him. Good job just keep up with the assignments and do not get behind. Nice person and is helpful if needed. Got A in both classes.

tag_professor: Gives good feedback (1)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)
comments: Kevin is a wonderful instructor. I took welding at Palomar during the summer session at night. Being a female I was a bit worried about how I would be treated/not taken seriously. My goal was to learn welding basics in order to expand my sculpting skills. Although I had to rethink my original plans, I came away with the ability to do basic welding.

tag_professor: Gives good feedback (1)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)
comments: Super cool guy, knows welding and understands what he is teaching. Lectures are useful, gives notes outlined in power point. Quizzes are easy and open note/book final. Is always willing to help students and do one on one demos. Would definately take him again.
